Types

ThreadProxyError = object of CatchableError
TargetNotFoundError = object of ThreadProxyError
  sender: string
  target: string

ActionConflictError = object of ThreadProxyError
  action: string

MessageUndeliveredError = object of ThreadProxyError
  kind: ThreadMessageKind
  action: string
  sender: string
  data: JsonNode

NameConflictError = object of ThreadProxyError
  threadName: string

ThreadMessageKind = enum
  EMIT, REQUEST, REPLY, SYS
ThreadMessage = object
  kind: ThreadMessageKind
  action: string
  json: JsonNode
  channel: ThreadChannelPtr
  callbackId: int

ThreadChannel = Channel[ThreadMessage]
ThreadChannelPtr = ptr Channel[ThreadMessage]
ThreadActionHandler = proc (data: JsonNode): Future[JsonNode] {...}{.gcsafe.}
ThreadDefaultActionHandler = proc (action: string; data: JsonNode): Future[JsonNode] {...}{.
    gcsafe.}
ThreadProxy = ref object of RootObj
  active: bool
  name: string
  mainChannel, channel: ThreadChannelPtr
  actions: Table[string, ThreadActionHandler]
  defaultAction: ThreadDefaultActionHandler
  callbackSeed: int
  jsonCallbacks: Table[int, Future[JsonNode]]
  channelCallbacks: Table[int, Future[ThreadChannelPtr]]
  directory: Table[string, ThreadChannelPtr]

MainThreadProxy = ref object of ThreadProxy
  channels: Table[string, ThreadChannelWrapper]
  threads: Table[string, ThreadWrapper]

ThreadToken = object
  name: string
  mainChannel, channel: ThreadChannelPtr

ThreadMainProc = proc (proxy: ThreadProxy) {...}{.thread, nimcall.}

    tags: [].}

    tags: [].}

    raises: [ActionConflictError, Exception], tags: [RootEffect].}
Set handler for action

    tags: [].}

proc send(proxy: ThreadProxy; target: ThreadChannelPtr; action: string; data: JsonNode): Future[
    void] {...}{.raises: [DeadThreadError, Exception, FutureError], tags: [RootEffect].}
proc ask(proxy: ThreadProxy; target: ThreadChannelPtr; action: string;
        data: JsonNode = nil): Future[JsonNode] {...}{.
    raises: [DeadThreadError, Exception, ValueError, FutureError], tags: [RootEffect].}

    raises: [ValueError, FutureError, Exception, DeadThreadError], tags: [RootEffect].}
Resolve name to channel 
proc send(proxy: ThreadProxy; target: string; action: string; data: JsonNode): Future[
    void] {...}{.raises: [Exception, FutureError], tags: [RootEffect].}
put one message to target's channel 
proc ask(proxy: ThreadProxy; target: string; action: string; data: JsonNode = nil): Future[
    JsonNode] {...}{.raises: [Exception, ValueError, FutureError], tags: [RootEffect].}
put one message to target's channel and complete until target's response 
proc process(proxy: ThreadProxy): bool {...}{.raises: [ValueError, Exception, KeyError,
    FutureError, DeadThreadError, Defect], tags: [RootEffect].}
Process one message on channel. Return false if channel is empty, otherwise true. 
proc stop(proxy: ThreadProxy) {...}{.inline, raises: [], tags: [].}
proc poll(proxy: ThreadProxy; interval: int = 16): Future[void] {...}{.
    raises: [Exception, FutureError], tags: [RootEffect, TimeEffect].}
proc createToken(proxy: MainThreadProxy; name: string): ThreadToken {...}{.
    raises: [NameConflictError], tags: [].}
Create token for new threadproxy 
proc createThread(proxy: MainThreadProxy; name: string; main: ThreadMainProc) {...}{.
    raises: [NameConflictError, Exception, ResourceExhaustedError],
    tags: [RootEffect].}
Create new thread managed by proxy with an unique name
